content:
Hello,

I struggle with a curious problem described here : https://github.com/jrouaix/wasm_pbm

To sum up, randomly, WASM (rust leptos, or Yew) crashes on Webkit Linux (Epiphany, or Tauri)

The variety of error messages is sooo big that I strongly suspect some low level race condition somewhere.

I don't have the skills to dig it myself, but could be important to the community here ...

some ideas folks ?

Jérôme

GitHub - jrouaix/wasm_pbm
Contribute to jrouaix/wasm_pbm development by creating an account on GitHub.
Hi Jérôme, I think you might have more luck getting answers/solutions for this in a more general-purpose WebAssembly context, such as the WebAssembly Discord
